product_name: Von Zipper Updo B4BC Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: When a bouffant or French twist isn't enough, slip on the Von Zipper Updo B4BC Sunglasses and enjoy more protection and style than any hairdo can offer. 100% UV protection. Impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses. The Von Zipper Updo B4BC Sunglasses feature nylon Grilamid frames and stainless-steel optical hinges.
short_description: When a bouffant or French twist isn't enough, slip on the Von Zipper Updo B4BC Sunglasses and enjoy more protection and style than any hairdo can offer.
